questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (517) 243-9743.

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes except for the

IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE

• Technical assistance was not request or required.

V. CONSULTATION
The agency was offered consultation in the following areas:
• Consultation was provided concerning the number of reports written in the
initial 30-day time period. It was clarified there only needs to be a preliminary
report and then the 30-day report.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
The renewal application received requested a change in capacity from 101 to 44 and
the removal of two units (Mandy’s Place and Medical) from the terms of the license.
This has been approved.
Maltreatment in Care
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans (CAP)
during this period under review.
Financial Overview
This is a county operated facility. The agency is financially operating within their
means. A complete county budget was conducted by Oakland County.
PREA compliance (if applicable)
N/A
Chief Administrator Assessment
The agency was complaint with all rules during the 2023 interim and did not have a
CAP to review. The agency reported they will continue to adhere to rules, provide
annual training for their staff, and review restraints. The agency will continue to
follow rules as stated in their assessment.
Staff and Youth Interviews
Staff interviewed validated enjoyment in their role and culture appears to be
positive. Administration feels they have quality staff, and they are doing well.

Youth were upbeat and only provided positive information about the agency. Youth
did not identify any safety concerns.
Description of Agency Walk Through
The agency is well maintained and clean. The agency has colorful posters and
wall decorations and has an inviting atmosphere. There were no safety issues
identified.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes. It is recommended that the agency be issued a renewal of their regular
license.
